content: Anonymous Gifting Platform

An online platform that allows people to send gifts to friends and loved ones without knowing their physical address. Users can choose a gift category, select a gift, and send it to the recipient via email or text message. The recipient then provides their preferred address for delivery.
Easy gift selection, gift categories, email and text message delivery, recipient address capture, sender tracking
Giftagram, Greetabl, BloomThat
Gift categories with unique items and sender tracking feature
Public Restroom Finder

A mobile app that helps people find nearby public restrooms that are clean and accessible. The app uses GPS to locate the nearest public restrooms and provides users with ratings and reviews from other users. Users can also filter restroom options based on accessibility features, such as diaper-changing stations or wheelchair accessibility.
GPS location, ratings and reviews, accessibility filters, restroom details, user-updated information
Flush Toilet Finder, SitOrSquat, Charmin's Sit or Squat
Accessible restroom filter and user-updated information
Car Maintenance Reminder Service

A subscription-based service that reminds car owners of their vehicle's upcoming maintenance needs based on their car's make, model, and year. Users receive notifications via email or text message and can schedule maintenance appointments directly through the service.
Personalized reminders, maintenance schedule, service booking, email and text message delivery, account dashboard
Openbay, RepairPal, Carfax
Personalized reminders and service booking feature
Portable Gym Equipment Rental

An online rental service that provides portable gym equipment to people who prefer working out at home or when traveling. Users can select from various equipment options and have them delivered to their location. The service also provides instructional videos and workout plans to users.
Equipment rental, delivery, instructional videos, workout plans, equipment cleaning and sanitizing
Peloton, Mirror, Hyfit Gear
Portable equipment rental with cleaning and sanitizing feature
Online mediation service

An online platform that connects people with professional mediators to help them resolve disputes and conflicts. Users can select from various mediation options, such as legal, family, or workplace mediation. The service provides virtual mediation sessions, secure document sharing, and access to legal resources.
Professional mediators, virtual mediation sessions, secure document sharing, legal resources, mediation options
Mediate.com, Modria, The Mediation Process
Virtual mediation sessions and access to legal resources
Online Language Learning Platform

An online platform that provides personalized language learning courses for people who want to learn a new language. Users can select from various language options and proficiency levels and are matched with experienced language tutors who provide one-on-one instruction. The platform also provides interactive learning materials and progress tracking.
Personalized language learning courses, one-on-one instruction, interactive learning materials, progress tracking, language options
Duolingo, Rosetta Stone, Babbel
Personalized language learning courses with one-on-one instruction feature
Personalized Vitamin Subscription Service

A subscription-based service that delivers personalized vitamin supplements to users based on their individual health and wellness needs. Users take a health assessment questionnaire, and the results are used to create a customized vitamin plan that is shipped to their home. The service also provides access to licensed nutritionists who can answer user questions.
Personalized vitamin plan, health assessment questionnaire, vitamin delivery, licensed nutritionists, user account dashboard
Care/of, Persona Nutrition, Baze
Personalized vitamin plan with access to licensed nutritionists feature
pain_point_title: complexity of finding a public restroom
pain_point_description: people who are traveling, working, or just out and about often find it challenging to locate a safe and clean public restroom quickly. this can result in discomfort and can impact normal daily activities. an app or service that provides locations of nearby public restrooms and rates them based on their cleanliness and accessibility would be helpful
audience_title: send a gift without knowing the recipient address
